summary:
Diano for UNPB-BBP
Includes Bikini and separate armor parts. Weight slider support.
descriptionHtml:
Update on 8/8/12: added non-BBP patch to Optional Files

Update on 8/29/12: added optional esp patch that adjusts encumbrance weight of some pieces, per user request. Overwrite main file esp.

Diano Bikini Armor for UNPB-BBP
adaptation by selobl
Skyrim v1.6 or greater

Description:
This armor was created using the Diano armor by NPR and a couple of small meshes from NPR\'s Inner Wear set. I split the mesh into pieces:

Bikini
Pauldrons
Skirt
Stockings
Boots
Bracers

I assigned the pieces to Biped Object slots according to the standard here: http://www.creationkit.com/Biped_Object
I fitted the pieces to the UNPB-BBP body by Calyps, with working weight slider and BBP. I also modified the standard Diano texture.

The pieces are craftable at any forge. Cloth version is under Misc. A light armor version is under Glass and requires the Glass Smithing perk. A heavy version is under Daedric and requires the Daedric Smithing perk. Armor versions are upgradable at any workbench. 

I kept the texture folder the same as the original, so if you don\'t like my texture you can install the original or the Royal retexture:

Diano by NPR/Kurese
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14670

Royal Retexture by Messiasmummo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19712

Required mods:

UNPB-BBP by Calyps
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

If you don\'t properly install the BBP package this mod will not work and your game will probably CTD. If you can\'t figure out BBP, you should spend your time learning research and trouble shooting skills - or pass this mod altogether.

A UNP-compatible texture, I use the latest by Dimon99

UNP by Dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

BBP animations if you want to see the jiggly-bits:

Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP by xp32
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272

Installation:

I recommend
Wrye Bash
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840 
If you\'re using it, I doubt I need to explain it.

or you could unzip the archive into your Data folder.

NMM - might work, I don\'t use NMM. Ask your colleagues on the forums how to install via NMM.

KNOWN ISSUES:
could be some clipping in some poses or animations
I\'m busy in RL and might not support this mod to a professional standard


Future plans:
squash any bugs I missed
UNP version for some folks whose mods I\'ve been using

Re-Use:
Like NPR/Kurese says - \"Please use this Mod Freely\"
be considerate and give NPR, Calyps and me credit


CREDITS and THANKS

thanks to NPR/Kurese and Calyps

Diano by NPR/Kurese
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14670

Inner Wear by NPR/Kurese
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15529

UNPB-BBP by Calyps
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

Caliente\'s tutorial and Nif Cleaner
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Lots of fine folks at tesadventures.com for technical info, inspiration and encouragement

Apachii, Halofarm, Psychos1s and Brokefoot for the hair, poses and race used in screenshots

Skyrim Nexus for a place to discover and share mods

Tools used:
Blender
Nikskope
GIMP
NifCleaner by Caliente
Creation Kit
7 Zip
Notepad
author: selobl
